Translations.Text: naneun hananim-e gwanhayeo jin lioeeneun yaegihal gwonliga eobs-eumyeo naega junim-ui malsseum-eul gajigo neohui ege wass-euni iseula-el jasondeulgwa hamkke gadolog hayeo jusoseo lago yo guhani
palaoga daedabhagil geudae ga jinsil-ilamyeon gajyeoon yejeung-eul bo ila hadeola
ittae mosega geuui jipang-ileuldeonjini bola geugeos-eun bunmyeonghan baem-i doeeossdeola
tto mosega geuui son-eul kkeonae ni bola geugeos-eun modeun gugyeongkkundeul-e ge hayahge doeeossdeola
ittae palao baegseongdeul-ui udumeolideul-i malhagil ineun suglyeondoen ma sulsala
geuga neohuiui ttang-eseo neohui deul-eul chubanghalyeo uidohani neohuideul eun eotteohge haess-eumyeon johgessneunyo
geudeul-i malhagil geuwa geuligogeuui hyeongjeleul jamsi bolyuhala geuli go salam-eul gag dosilo bonaeeo
suglyeondoen uliui modeun masulsadeul-eul geudaeege oge haliyo
geulihayeo masulsadeul-i pala o-egelo wa malhagil mullon jeohuiga sunglihandamyeon geue sang-eunghan bosang-eul badge doegessjiyo lago malhani
geuga malhagil geu isang-ila ttohan jigchaeg-i ollaga nae yeop-e issge doelila hani
geudeul-i malhagil moseyeo geu daega meonjeo deonjil geos-inyo animyeon u liga meonjeo deonjil geos-inyo lago malha ni
mosega illeo galodoe neohuiga meonjeo deonjila hani geudeul-i meonjeo deon jyeo baegseongdeul-ui nun-eul yuhoghago geudeul eul dulyeoum-eulo gadeugchage haneun ma sul-eul boyeossdeola
geuleonhu hananim-eun mose-ui sim jung-eul gamhwahayeo geudaeui jipang-ileul deonjila hani bola geugeos-i geudeul-i kkumyeonaen heowileul samkideola
geuleohgehayeo jinliga ibjungdoe go geudeul-i hadeon modeun ildeul-i gong heohage doeeossdeola
geulihayeo geudeul-i geugos-e seo paebaehayeo mulleoseoni
